products.title: Twill Stripe Linen Gold Shadow Roman Blind
products.description: There's a real sense of opulence about this stunning, darkly stylish blind. The deep grey, almost black, is complimented with gold for a luxurious richness. Crisp and classy, the colour combo is effortlessly swanky, and feels glorious too thanks to its sumptuous linen-mix fabric there's a real sense of opulence about this stunning, darkly stylish blind.

products.title: Shadow Leaf Linen Green Roman Blind
products.description: Go green with this shadow leaf linen green roman blind, so bright and full of life, it's just as good as filling your home with plants. The vibrant shades and oversized leaf pattern are refreshing, giving you the very best of the outdoors inside. Plus with the linen mix fabric a go green with this shadow leaf linen green roman blind, so bright and full of life, it's just as good as filling your home with plants.

products.title: Shadow Leaf Linen Admiral Roman Blind
products.description: Exotic this shadow leaf linen admiral roman blind certainly is, the bold foliage design taken from the depths of the jungle and brought into your home. The deep blue colour way is remarkable too, filling your home with colour, whilst delivering it with incredible taste and styl exotic this shadow leaf linen admiral roman blind certainly is, the bold foliage design taken from the depths of the jungle and brought into your home.

products.title: Birdsong, Shadow - Roman Blind
products.description: With a gentle off-white canvas and an artistic flourish of naturally inspired shades, birdsong shadow is the epitome of style meets substance. The shades of grey flow effortlessly into one another to create a timeless look that will never grow old. Match birdsong shadow with some simple country touches like a light beige rug on a wooden floor and a hessian canvas on the wall to create the homely atmosphere you'll never want to leave.

products.title: Silver Birch, Shadow - Roman Blind
products.description: With a light crisp canvas acting as the foundation for a subtle variation of greys and browns, silver birch shadow is the design that you have been searching for. The way in which the colours make their own way across the fabric reminds the eye of the free-flowing beauty of watercolour masterpieces. When you want to work shadow into your dcor it pays to keep things simple. Find a matching scatter cushion cover or throw for the end of the bed and keep the rest of your dcor neutral.
